column4: guys, i have 2 hds (1 IDE 1 SATA). Linux recognizes them as /dev/hda and /dev/sda. How can I set GRUB with that?
at the grub command line(run grub in linux or hit c at the menu) type in root (<tab> and it will list off devices
and if you do cat /<tab> youll get a listing of filenames on the device you last set as root
i beleive each drive whould have a diff number
